item.title: Freqtrade Algorithmic Trading Tutorial Concise
item.description: Introduction Freqtrade is an open-source cryptocurrency algorithmic trading software that allows traders to automate their trades with customized strategies. This tutorial is designed to introduce you to the basic concepts and operating procedures of Freqtrade in simple language and step-by-step analysis, so that you can understand and start using this tool for algorithmic trading. Summary Introduction to Freqtrade: Learn what Freqtrade is and its main features. Environment Setup: How to install and configure Freqtrade.
